alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lincoln County through 700 PM CDT... At 618 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Chandler. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chandler. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 162 and 168. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
